definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: It is the rail and commercial center for the vast northern section of the country. Population, 385, 603.
sentences.chinese: 是這個國家北部廣大地區鐵路和商業中心。

sentences.english: He has a comfortable apartment in a high-rise building in the business center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他在市商業中心一幢高層建築裏有一套舒適的公寓。

sentences.english: Is the business center this way or that way?
sentences.chinese: 去商業中心是走這條路還是那條路？

sentences.english: Suitable to construction of high-grade residences and regional business center.
sentences.chinese: 適合建設高檔住宅和區域商業中心。

sentences.english: The city is a processing and trade center. Population, 27, 591.
sentences.chinese: 該城市是一個加工和商業中心。

sentences.english: You can go shopping at Jiefang Bei shopping center.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去解放碑商業中心盡情購物。

sentences.english: The shops in commercial centers are much more expensive than others.
sentences.chinese: 在商業中心的商店要比其它地方的商店貴得多。

sentences.english: Nashville is a port of entry and major commercial center known especially for its music industry. Population, 488,374.
sentences.chinese: 納什維爾是一個進口港和主要的商業中心。

sentences.english: Dunedin was the first major business centre of New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 達尼丁是新西蘭的主要商業中心。

sentences.english: Is one of the communication and commercial centers within the pearl River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 珠江三角洲內的交通和商業中心之一，鎮內有。

sentences.english: These telephones can be found in many locations in commercial areas.
sentences.chinese: 在很多商業中心都有公共電話。

sentences.english: Comfort Inn and Suites King Avenue is located on the city fringe of Sale.
sentences.chinese: 金大街凱富套房酒店位於薩里的觀光和商業中心位置。

sentences.english: You will be taken to visit Nanjing Road, the down-town area.
sentences.chinese: 就會帶你們去南京路，那是上海的商業中心。

definition: (used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
